trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around May 31st 2008
Summary: bright orange ball off light that imploded into itself and disappeared
divs: Sighting DetailsI had gotten up from the couch and as I stood up I saw a large commercial jet in the sky in my window right above my head. I live on the 7th floor and it was very low and if it were any lower I could have probably hitched a ride. As I looked up and saw this, this plane was coming in heading West towards Ohare. This is a normal everyday occurrance living just miles from the airport. My attention then went to a bright orange ball of light hovering in the sky in front of me about 2 blocks away facing West. I thought at first "Where did that planet come from"? Thinking I had not noticed this before. As I watched the light it did not move but the commercial airliner was getting closer to this object, yet a bit overhead. Then I realised that all the planes that usually I see in the West are further back in the sky. Then I went to get my camera. As I lifted the camera and could even get it up to my eyes this ball of light started to sparkle like a firecracker and it lit up and turned into a tansparent orange square which then turned into a pin of light and just disappeared into nothing. When the object turned into the transparent square of orange light I could see through it. When the object went into itself, the square going into a pin of light, it looked like water going down a drain so fast like a vortex. Still In disbeleive I continued to watch for a plane,ISS, bird, anything that could explain this. I could find nothing. There was no noise and skies were fairly clear. It happened just before dark so the sky was a turquoise blue.
